unnormalised: arre, tumkam khobor asli kai, Bharat 26/01/1950 vellar ganrajy zalo?  kalich zalem oxem dista, punn taka 74 vorsam zali!
normalised: Arre, tumkaan khobor aasaa, Bharot sattavis Janer, ek hazar nauxe ponchasak ganrajy zalo? Kall aiz zaleaari polleunka distaa, punn tevunche 74 vorsham zale!
text: arre, tumkam khobor asli kai, Bharat 26/01/1950 vellar ganrajy zalo?  kalich zalem oxem dista, punn taka 74 vorsam zali!
